function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 due to ineffective vaccine roll-out strategies","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and prolonged pandemic","Mitigation":"Implement effective smart logistics solutions for vaccine roll-out and resource allocation","Technologies":"IoT, connected fleets, smart logistics solutions","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, logistics companies"},{"Description":"Decrease in economic activity leading to budget cuts in industrial IoT (IIoT) adoption","Impact":"Reduced resilience of supply chains and manufacturing processes during pandemics or disasters","Mitigation":"Promote sustainable IIoT solutions and emphasize the long-term importance of IIoT during crises","Technologies":"IIoT, sustainable IIoT solutions","People":"Supply chain and manufacturing professionals, industry stakeholders","Owner":"Industry associations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of supply chain visibility and resilience during pandemics or disasters","Impact":"Ineffective response to disruptions and slower recovery from economic downturns","Mitigation":"Enhance supply chain visibility and resilience through IIoT adoption and smart logistics solutions","Technologies":"IIoT, smart logistics solutions","People":"Supply chain managers, industry stakeholders","Owner":"Supply chain management companies, industry associations"}]}
